**If you are submitting a potential course for the code-to-learn showcase, please include the following information:

- Issue Title: The name of the class & instructor
- Issue Body:
	- Who will be present?
	- What is the course? What kind of students do you have (e.g., upper-division undergraduate, Master's)
	- Brief description of what code-to-learn activities are included. Feel free to link your course site, or to any materials you would like to be distributed to attendees.
	
If you intend to present a course, please file an issue by June 18. After this date, you will recieve an email with presentation instructions.
